page.title: 19RECREATION
page.content: At the sports centre there is a sports hall with gym equipment,a weight training room,a licensed bar and a dance floor which can be hired.There is a spectators gallery which overlooks the hall and squash courts.Outside are tennis and football facilities. A swimming pool is being built due to open in 1986,which will replace the outdoor pool in Stowmarket. Stowmarket golf club is a thriving and popular social meeting place.They have an 18 hole course covering 120 acres.They also have a club house and an equipment shop. The Shepherd and Dog pub in Onehouse is thatched and was built in the 1400's.It has 1 acre of land which is used as a beer garden and childrens' play area. The licensing hours are 11am-2.30pm and 7pm-11pm.
